item.title: Lesson 1 1 Signal Flow
item.description:
Purpose

Clearly state what this lesson exists to teach.

Core Concept

Explain the main idea in plain language.

Real-World Context

Where this appears in real audio / Hi-Fi equipment.

Common Failure Modes

  • What goes wrong
  • How it presents
  • Why it matters

Interactive Challenge

Pose a diagnostic or reasoning problem.

Reflection

What assumption should be questioned after this lesson?
